buildCommand: git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1 flutter-sdk && export PATH="$PATH:$(pwd)/flutter-sdk/bin" && flutter --version && flutter config --enable-web && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release --dart-define=SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --dart-define=SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
